name: Ensure basic/primitive roles are not used
body: Basic roles include thousands of permissions across all Google Cloud services. In production environments, do not grant basic roles unless there is no alternative. Instead, grant the most limited predefined roles or custom roles that meet your needs.
remediationDescription: Replace basic roles with the equivalent predefined or custom roles. You can read more [here](https://cloud.google.com/iam/docs/understanding-roles#basic-definitions).
